::DarkMouse::

She transformed into mouse mode and stayed close to the ground.  She 
had a bad feeling about this.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> Quickstrike lowered his body closer to the ground, uneasy with a 
> foolish order of going back to the Predacon cave when he and Dark 
> Mouse suposed to be playing dead.
> 
> He opened his comm-link to Black Arachnia and said: "Why--why do we 
> have t' go back there?"
